name: wolfberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small red fruit used in traditional Asian cooking and believed by some people to be very good for health, or the plant that it grows on: The wolfberry is one of the so-called superfoods. Wolfberries are bright orange-red, oblong-shaped berries grown in China. Wolfberry shoots and leaves are grown commercially as a leaf vegetable. Synonym
goji berry
More examplesFewer examplesWolfberry is a sweet, mild fruit that the Chinese have used to ensure healthy eyes for nearly 2,000 years.The vitamin C content of wolfberry is in fact comparable to many citrus fruits and strawberries.
